jot.math.geometry.generators.noise

Class AbstractNoiseGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.math.geometry.generators.noise.AbstractNoiseGenerator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Improved, Marble, Ridged, Simplex, Turbulence, Wood

    public abstract class AbstractNoiseGenerator
extends Object
    Abstract class that all noise generators must extend.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

    • Method Detail

      • reinitialize

        public void reinitialize()
        Reinitialize the permutation array based on a random number generator seed. The algorithm used to initialize this array is described in "Texture & Modeling: A Procedural Approach", by David S. Ebert, F. Kenton Musgrave, Darwyn Peachey, Ken Perlin, and Steven Worley, Morgan Kaufmann Publishers, ISBN 1-55860-848-6.

      • reinitialize

        public void reinitialize(long seed)
        Reinitialize the permutation array based on a random number generator seed. The algorithm used to initialize this array is described in "Texture & Modeling: A Procedural Approach", by David S. Ebert, F. Kenton Musgrave, Darwyn Peachey, Ken Perlin, and Steven Worley, Morgan Kaufmann Publishers, ISBN 1-55860-848-6.
        Parameters:
        seed - for the random number generator.

      • Noise

        public abstract double Noise(double x,
                             double y,
                             double z,
                             double frequency)
        The final generated noise value for position X,Y,Z that each noise generator must implement.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        z -
        frequency -
        Returns:
        generated noise value for position X,Y,Z.
